appamanynya 4 nam meththa,karuna,muditha ha upekkha yana satharayi.apraaamana sathwayan aramunukara bhawana wadiya yuthu bawin appamanynya lesa handinwe.methek sathwayan kerehi wyawaptha kala yuthuya min obbata wyahaptha nokala yuthu yayi mehi simawak natha.siyalu sathwayanwa aramunu karagaththath bhawanawa aarambhayedi thama aramunukota bhawanawa prawagunakala yuthuya.maithri bhawanawa wadana aadi kammikaya mulinma thama kerehi maithrii wada hondin puruduwiya yuthuya.mehi sandahan aadi kammikaya nam mulinma bhawanawata elambaena palapurudukam nathi pudgalayayi.aarambhaya thula thama kerehi maithrina wada in anathuruwa aasanna sathwayan aramunukara odhi washayen eya wyaiptha kala yuthuya.odhi washayen eya wya ptha kara anathurawa anodhi washayen wyaeptha kalayuthuya.
